_meta.witness_rule: TR7: NO interpretation. Each step is a document reference, not a conclusion.

chains.title: Kärnkraft — från avvecklingsbeslut till nybyggnation
chains.title_en: Nuclear — from phase-out decision to new-build legislation

steps.title: Prop. 1996/97:176 — Energipolitik
steps.description_neutral: Government bill proposing nuclear phase-out framework with sequential reactor closures.

steps.title: Bet. 1996/97:NU12 — Energipolitik
steps.description_neutral: Committee on Industry and Trade report on energy policy proposition.

steps.title: Lag (1984:3) om kärnteknisk verksamhet (amended)
steps.description_neutral: Act on Nuclear Activities — base legislation governing nuclear operations in Sweden, amended multiple times.

steps.title: Prop. 2022/23:16 — Fler satisfactionlösningar för nya kärnreaktorer
steps.description_neutral: Government bill removing the prohibition on new nuclear reactors beyond existing sites, allowing new-build at new locations.

steps.title: Prop. 2016/17:1 — Budgetpropositionen (energiskattedelen)
steps.description_neutral: Budget bill containing proposed changes to energy tax on electricity, including rate adjustments.

steps.title: Bet. 2016/17:SkU1 — Skatter
steps.description_neutral: Tax Committee report on the budget bill's tax provisions including energy tax rates.

steps.title: Riksdagsskrivelse 2016/17:68
steps.description_neutral: Parliamentary decision confirming adoption of the tax provisions.

steps.title: Lag (1994:1776) om skatt på energi (amended 2017)
steps.description_neutral: Energy Tax Act — primary legislation governing taxation of electricity and fuels in Sweden.

chains.title: Byggnaders energikrav — EU-direktiv till BBR
chains.title_en: Building energy requirements — EU directive to BBR

steps.title: Direktiv 2010/31/EU — Energy Performance of Buildings (EPBD)
steps.description_neutral: EU directive on energy performance of buildings requiring member states to set minimum energy requirements.

steps.title: Prop. 2005/06:145 — Nationellt program för energieffektivisering
steps.description_neutral: Government bill implementing building energy efficiency requirements into Swedish law.

steps.title: Boverkets byggregler (BBR) — avsnitt 9 Energihushållning
steps.description_neutral: Boverket's building rules section 9 — energy conservation requirements including primary energy numbers and U-values.

steps.title: Direktiv (EU) 2024/1275 — EPBD recast
steps.description_neutral: Recast EPBD directive with zero-emission building requirements and renovation targets.
